text: Ra tyasa avasthako smarana gara jaba timi thorai thiyau, dhartima nirbala thiyau, bhayabhita avasthama rahanthyau ki arule timiharula'i kahim nasta nagarihalun ani allahale timila'i sarana diyo ra aphno sahayatale timila'i sakti pradana garyo ra ramra ramra kuraharu diyo jasabata timile usako abhara prakata gara
